About.Hours & facilities: Open Mon - Fri 9am - 4.30pm; closed Fridays and Public Holidays. General reference and historical services available. Copying services for books, journals and photographs to A3. Note: Original documents and newspapers may not be photocopied

About.Access: All visits by prior appointment. Access and research fees apply. Closed periods applyÂ to certain classes of records.

About.Acquisition focus: The administrative papers generated by the church through successive bishops and archbishops of Adelaide, parishes, diocesan offices and church agencies. The archives also accepts significant collections from Church affiliated organisations or individuals within the archdiocese.
